alert.note: Alert for Frederick; Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 22 at 10:35PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of north central Maryland, including the following counties: Frederick and Washington. * WHEN...Until 445 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1032 PM EST, local law enforcement reported flooding in the Buckeystown area. Additional flooding along small streams is imminent. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Frederick... Thurmont... Emmitsburg... Harry Grove Stadium... Ballenger Creek... Brunswick... Walkersville... Boonsboro... Braddock Heights... Mount Aetna... Mount Lena... San Mar... Harpers Ferry... Clover Hill... Wolfsville... Discovery-Spring Garden... Linganore-Bartonsville... Point Of Rocks... Adamstown... Jefferson... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
